com.nhaarman.listviewanimations.widget

Interface DynamicListView.Swappable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AlphaInAnimationAdapter, AnimateAdditionAdapter, AnimateDismissAdapter, AnimationAdapter, ArrayAdapter, BaseAdapterDecorator, ExpandableListItemAdapter, ResourceAnimationAdapter, ScaleInAnimationAdapter, SimpleSwipeUndoAdapter, SingleAnimationAdapter, SwingBottomInAnimationAdapter, SwingLeftInAnimationAdapter, SwingRightInAnimationAdapter, SwipeDismissAdapter, SwipeUndoAdapter, TimedUndoAdapter
    Enclosing class:
    DynamicListView

    public static interface DynamicListView.Swappable
    Interface, usually implemented by a BaseAdapterDecorator, that indicates that it can swap the visual position of two list items.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void swapItems(int positionOne, int positionTwo)
      Swaps the item on the first adapter position with the item on the second adapter position.

    • Method Detail

      • swapItems

        void swapItems(int positionOne,
             int positionTwo)
        Swaps the item on the first adapter position with the item on the second adapter position. Be sure to call BaseAdapter.notifyDataSetChanged() if appropriate when implementing this method.
        Parameters:
        positionOne - First adapter position.
        positionTwo - Second adapter position.
